channel.title: Riot-X blowing new life in rsps
channel.description:
[center][img]http://www.fontspace.com/preview/m/e82e98c863ac962acd6eea94cec966be.png[/img][/center] [center]hello there evreyone let me introduce myself my name is theowned. not in real life my real name is dennis i am 13 years old and i am busy whit a project. to blow the rsps new life in the server is called Riot-X i only need a great team to join whit me whe also need somebody who makes banner for us and some signatures :) the server is based on a delta server and the client an bluurs client why? becaese whe can do much more whit it :D[/center] [center][size=18pt] the prgress list[/size][/center]
adding 622 charachter models - done (ty to dutchboy) adding 633 items and objects - started making home cool :D - almost done adding 508 maps - not started adding full godwars - not started making camelot party room the shops making a splash screen - done (ty to dutchboy) adding summoning - not stated adding new skill tabs - not started adding XP toggle- not started adding run toggle - not started adding quick prayer - not started
[center][size=18pt]what whe need[/size][/center] [center]sourche coders 0/2 client coders 0/2 banner and signature maker 0/1 testers 0/5[/center] [center][size=18pt] what to do if you wanna join[/size] [size=18pt]fill this in[/size][/center]
why you want to join Riot-X: any past expirience?: what you can do for the upcoming server: something extra you want to say:
some pictures: [IMG]http://i858.photobucket.com/albums/ab142/owndknightscape/firstone.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i858.photobucket.com/albums/ab142/owndknightscape/secondone.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i858.photobucket.com/albums/ab142/owndknightscape/thirdone.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i858.photobucket.com/albums/ab142/owndknightscape/turkeyone.jpg[/img] [center][size=18pt] hopely see you later in Riot-X[/size][/center] my msn : dennissnijder@live.nl theowned

item.title: Riot-X blowing new life in rsps
item.dc:creator: @Mr_x1 Mr...x..
item.description:
@Mr_x1 wrote:

I will help code if I get something in return, maybe player rights when it comes out.

Read full topic
item.source: Riot-X blowing new life in rsps

item.title: Riot-X blowing new life in rsps
item.dc:creator: @theowned theowned
item.description:
@theowned wrote:

[center][/center]
[center]hello there evreyone
let me introduce myself my name is theowned.
not in real life my real name is dennis
i am 13 years old and i am busy whit a project.
to blow the rsps new life in
the server is called Riot-X
i only need a great team to join whit me
whe also need somebody who makes banner for us and some signatures
the server is based on a delta server and the client an bluurs client
why? becaese whe can do much more whit it :D[/center]

[center][size=18pt] the prgress list[/size][/center]

adding 622 charachter models - done (ty to dutchboy) adding 633 items and objects - started making home cool :D - almost done adding 508 maps - not started adding full godwars - not started making camelot party room the shops making a splash screen - done (ty to dutchboy) adding summoning - not stated adding new skill tabs - not started adding XP toggle- not started adding run toggle - not started adding quick prayer - not started

[center][size=18pt]what whe need[/size][/center]

[center]sourche coders 0/2
client coders 0/2
banner and signature maker 0/1
testers 0/5[/center]
[center][size=18pt]
what to do if you wanna join[/size]

[size=18pt]fill this in[/size][/center]

why you want to join Riot-X: any past expirience?: what you can do for the upcoming server: something extra you want to say:

some pictures:


[center][size=18pt]
hopely see you later in Riot-X[/size][/center]

my msn : dennissnijder@live.nl
theowned
